RegulatoryAuthorizationType.name: RegulatoryAuthorizationType
RegulatoryAuthorizationType.description: Represents the authorization issued by the regulatory body.

Description.description: Text describing the license or permit that can be issued.

IssuingDepartmentId.description: The ID of the regulatory authority that can issue this license or permit.

Jurisdiction.description: Text describing the geographical area or legal jurisdiction for which this license or permit is authorized.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when a user most recently viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when a user most recently viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of this license or permit type.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ProcessingDuration.description: Text describing the standard amount of time it takes to process an application for this permit or license.

RegulatoryAuthCategory (Service Category.description: The category of this regulatory authorization.

RegulatoryAuthCode (Service Code).description: The service code for this regulatory authorization.
